MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH3 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Leven Terrace and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.23am. Our engineers have arrived at the Tarvit Street substation to investigate and repair the fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:55am on Friday 23rd October 2020.
